DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the newly released Spectral OCT/SLO (OTI, Toronto, Canada) with the Zeiss Stratus OCT (Carl-Zeiss Meditec, Dublin, CA) with regards to the quality of the images obtained as well as the ease of use.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of a Spectral OCT/SLO With the Stratus OCT for Imaging Various Retinal Pathologies
